title: Ethnic Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Education Design: Application of the Tri Mandala Concept

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Professional Work Experience
context.additional_context: Participants engage in mathematics learning that reflects cultural values and local wisdom in a BYOD environment, with practical application skills verified through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can integrate cultural elements of the Tri Mandala concept into mathematical problem-solving.
Learners can mathematically model real-life problems using online resources provided in a flipped learning format.
Learners can complete a mathematics project reflecting cultural contexts in a small-scale collaborative environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
